The BLACK Joomla Template for Joomla 1.6

Version: 1.1

Authors Homepage
Licence Information

Color variations

field.name: whatWidth
field.label: TEMPLATE WIDTH
field.description: Here you can decide if you want to use Dynamic with or Fixed width. Choose the one you want and edit the following parameters..

field.name: pageMaxWidth
field.label: max-width: of the Template
field.description: Default = 1180px - Choose the maximum width of the Template. The Template will get it and be dynamic.

field.name: pageWidth
field.label: width: of the Template
field.description: Default = 980px - Choose the fixed width of the Template. The Template will get it and be fixed.

field.name: colorVariation
field.label: Default Color Variation
field.description: Choose the default color variation! --- It will be overwritten by a cookie if the stylechanger in the fronend is used

field.name: useJavascript
field.label: Use Javascript?
field.description: Here you can decide if you want to use the Javascript Effects in the Template or not. Alle Effects are eyecatchers and not important functions in the Joomla Template. The styleswitcher is not included here. It can be on/offed below.

field.name: showStyleswitcher
field.label: Show the Styleswitcher in the Header?
field.description: Here you can decide if you want to show the Styleswitcher in the Header to let your users switch the CSS color Styles.

field.name: showLogo
field.label: Show Image Logo?
field.description: IF ON: Show Joomla Sitetitle must be OFF!

field.name: showSitetitle
field.label: Show the Joomla - Sitetitle in the Header?
field.description: IF ON: Show Image Logo must be OFF!

field.name: FontSize
field.label: Sitetitle Font Size
field.description: Font Size of the Sitename Name in Pixel - Just play a bit with this to find out your best setting - default = 20

field.name: FontColor
field.label: Sitetitle Color | sample: FFFFFF
field.description: Color of the Sitetitle - default: FFFFFF = white
